CustomField.description: The "The" at the end is part of the next sentence in the quotation template. Reason to have this word in is because otherwise the carriage return BR() would be truncated.
CustomField.formula: Case( Type_of_quotation__c, "Budgetary Quotation", "This document is provided for budgetary purposes only and does not constitute any binding offer or agreement." & BR() & "The", "The")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Adds a condition that is specific to budgetary quotations.
CustomField.label: Condition Budgetary Quote
